title:
for dawson creek fans 

does anyone know where in wilmington 

the funeral scene for mitch\'s funeral was filmed?  i know the show has been over for awhile but would to visit the location it had beautiful old trees 

any help locating the area ?
text:
It was in Airlie Gardens.

Sorry for the delay in the answer. It was supposed to have been
posted some time ago, but we had a backlog of questions and problems
with a server and I think this one got lost in the shuffle.
